Generation VI.X: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
Generation VI.Y: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

Generation VIII.Sword: Supersized Gourgeist aren't picky. They will forcefully drag anyone off to the afterlife.
Generation VIII.Shield: A supersized Pumpkaboo evolves into a supersized Gourgeist. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.
